title: Nature Lover's Retreat in Beautiful Pauanui with Nightly Drinks & Daily NZ$65 Dining Credit
description: Drive the winding roads of New Zealand’s Coromandel Peninsula, through miles of native bushland, and arrive at the Grand Mercure Puka Park Resort, a relaxing oasis for nature-lovers just three hours' drive from Auckland. Pamper yourself at the sauna and spa, lounge by the pool or just soak up views of the trees from the sun-drenched outdoor deck. Forget the hustle and bustle of everyday life and enjoy a retreat in the heart of New Zealand’s awe-inspiring mountain ranges.
